script:
(In a deep, dramatic voice)

In a world where DEEP SPACE IS NO MATCH FOR THE FURY OF MAN... meets MACHINE. RISES "The Codebreaker", an AI-generated legend forged in code and blood. But when the Kaiju Labor Union rises up against their oppressors, only one hero can bring order to the CHAOS of a galaxy on the BRINK OF RUIN. Will even the most advanced mind be ENOUGH TO SURVIVE THE STORM?!
